High Priest Gereth:
This place is where you can address Sayha directly, and the God will listen
In the Wind Spirit Realm I always asked for Sayha's advice in something went wrong in Faeron.
I'm glad that this obelisk has survived the transfer to the Material Realm. However, I don't hear Sayha's voice anymore, and it troubles me to no end. but I do believe that the God would never leave his children.
